Welcome to Jesus at the Garden

We are a community that loves Jesus and each other. We meet for picnics, Bible study, and more. Come join us!

Find Friends, Grow in Faith

We are a community of Christians who seek to know Jesus and make him known. We gather for worship, teaching, prayer, and fellowship. We also meet in small groups to study the Bible, pray, and care for one another.
